entry.summary: First things first, I’m new to using Jekyll as a static site generator so there’s a chance the formatting looks weird overall. The first iteration vs the final iteration side by side A Project In Retrospect Over the next few weeks I’m going to be retroactively documenting the first major project I’ve worked on since college.
